mapper.insert:
insert into product_sku_supply_unit_draft (supply_unit_code, supply_unit_name, no_tax_purchase_price, tax_included_price, joint_franchise_rate, point, is_default, del_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, product_sku_code, usage_status, product_sku_name,categories_supply_channels_code, categories_supply_channels_name,tax_rate,factory_sku_code,apply_show,apply_type,company_code,company_name, origin_tax_included_price,rate_of_margin,origin_rate_of_margin) values
(#{item.supplyUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplyUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.noTaxPurchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.taxIncludedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jointFranchiseRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, Now(), #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.productSkuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.factorySkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyShow}, #{item.applyType}, #{item.companyCode}, #{item.companyName}, #{item.originTaxIncludedPrice},#{item.rateOfMargin},#{item.originRateOfMargin})

insert into product_sku_supply_unit (supply_unit_code, supply_unit_name, no_tax_purchase_price, tax_included_price, joint_franchise_rate, point, is_default, del_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, product_sku_code, usage_status, product_sku_name, apply_code,categories_supply_channels_code, categories_supply_channels_name,tax_rate,factory_sku_code) values
(#{item.supplyUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplyUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.noTaxPurchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.taxIncludedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jointFranchiseRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.productSkuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.factorySkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into apply_product_sku_supply_unit (supply_unit_code, supply_unit_name, no_tax_purchase_price, tax_included_price, joint_franchise_rate, point, is_default, del_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, product_sku_code, usage_status, product_sku_name, apply_code, categories_supply_channels_code,categories_supply_channels_name, tax_rate,factory_sku_code,be_effective, selection_effective_time, selection_effective_start_time, direct_supervisor_code, direct_supervisor_name, form_no, auditor_status,apply_show,apply_type,company_code,company_name,approval_name,approval_remark, origin_tax_included_price,rate_of_margin,origin_rate_of_margin) values
(#{item.supplyUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplyUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.noTaxPurchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.taxIncludedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jointFranchiseRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.productSkuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.factorySkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beEffective}, #{item.selectionEffectiveTime}, #{item.selectionEffectiveStartTime}, #{item.directSupervisorCode}, #{item.directSupervisorName}, #{item.formNo}, #{item.auditorStatus}, #{item.applyShow}, #{item.applyType}, #{item.companyCode}, #{item.companyName}, #{item.approvalName}, #{item.approvalRemark}, #{item.originTaxIncludedPrice}, #{item.rateOfMargin}, #{item.originRateOfMargin} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_sku_supply_unit where product_sku_code=#{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT * FROM product_sku_supply_unit_draft WHERE del_flag=0 and product_sku_code in
#{item.skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM product_sku_supply_unit_draft WHERE product_sku_code in
#{item.skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id aid, a.supply_unit_code asupply_unit_code, a.supply_unit_name asupply_unit_name, a.no_tax_purchase_price ano_tax_purchase_price, a.tax_included_price atax_included_price, a.joint_franchise_rate ajoint_franchise_rate, a.point apoint, a.tax_rate atax_rate, a.factory_sku_code afactory_sku_code, a.is_default ais_default, a.product_sku_code aproduct_sku_code, a.product_sku_name aproduct_sku_name, a.usage_status ausage_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.del_flag adel_flag, a.create_time acreate_time, a.create_by acreate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.categories_supply_channels_code acategories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name acategories_supply_channels_name, b.id bid, b.supply_unit_code bsupply_unit_code, b.supply_unit_name bsupply_unit_name, b.product_sku_code bproduct_sku_code, b.product_sku_name bproduct_sku_name, b.out_put bout_put, b.need_days bneed_days, b.apply_code bapply_code, b.del_flag bdel_flag, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by from apply_product_sku_supply_unit a left join apply_product_sku_supply_unit_capacity b on a.product_sku_code = b.product_sku_code and a.supply_unit_code = b.supply_unit_code and a.apply_code = b.apply_code where a.product_sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.apply_code = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id aid, a.supply_unit_code asupply_unit_code, a.supply_unit_name asupply_unit_name, a.no_tax_purchase_price ano_tax_purchase_price, a.tax_included_price atax_included_price, a.joint_franchise_rate ajoint_franchise_rate, a.point apoint, a.tax_rate atax_rate, a.factory_sku_code afactory_sku_code, a.is_default ais_default, a.product_sku_code aproduct_sku_code, a.product_sku_name aproduct_sku_name, a.usage_status ausage_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.del_flag adel_flag, a.create_time acreate_time, a.create_by acreate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.categories_supply_channels_code acategories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name acategories_supply_channels_name, b.id bid, b.supply_unit_code bsupply_unit_code, b.supply_unit_name bsupply_unit_name, b.product_sku_code bproduct_sku_code, b.product_sku_name bproduct_sku_name, b.out_put bout_put, b.need_days bneed_days, b.apply_code bapply_code, b.del_flag bdel_flag, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by from product_sku_supply_unit a left join product_sku_supply_unit_capacity b on a.product_sku_code = b.product_sku_code and a.supply_unit_code = b.supply_unit_code where a.product_sku_code = #{skuCode}

select supply_unit_code as supplierCode, supply_unit_name as supplierName, product_sku_code as skuCode, product_sku_name as skuName from product_sku_supply_unit where product_sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id aid, a.supply_unit_code asupply_unit_code, a.supply_unit_name asupply_unit_name, a.no_tax_purchase_price ano_tax_purchase_price, a.tax_included_price atax_included_price, a.joint_franchise_rate ajoint_franchise_rate, a.point apoint, a.tax_rate atax_rate, a.factory_sku_code afactory_sku_code, a.is_default ais_default, a.product_sku_code aproduct_sku_code, a.product_sku_name aproduct_sku_name, a.usage_status ausage_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.del_flag adel_flag, a.create_time acreate_time, a.create_by acreate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.categories_supply_channels_code acategories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name acategories_supply_channels_name, b.id bid, b.supply_unit_code bsupply_unit_code, b.supply_unit_name bsupply_unit_name, b.product_sku_code bproduct_sku_code, b.product_sku_name bproduct_sku_name, b.out_put bout_put, b.need_days bneed_days, b.apply_code bapply_code, b.del_flag bdel_flag, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by from product_sku_supply_unit a left join product_sku_supply_unit_capacity b on a.product_sku_code = b.product_sku_code and a.supply_unit_code = b.supply_unit_code where a.product_sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
from apply_product_sku_supply_unit where be_effective = 0 and auditor_status = 2 and selection_effective_time = 0 and selection_effective_start_time <= now()

SELECT
FROM product_sku_supply_unit_draft a where a.del_flag = 0 and a.apply_show = 0
AND a.supply_unit_code = #{vo.supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.supply_unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{vo.supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id aid, a.supply_unit_code asupply_unit_code, a.supply_unit_name asupply_unit_name, a.no_tax_purchase_price ano_tax_purchase_price, a.tax_included_price atax_included_price, a.joint_franchise_rate ajoint_franchise_rate, a.point apoint, a.approval_remark aapproval_remark, a.apply_type aapply_type, a.approval_name aapproval_name, a.tax_rate atax_rate, a.factory_sku_code afactory_sku_code, a.is_default ais_default, a.product_sku_code aproduct_sku_code, a.product_sku_name aproduct_sku_name, a.usage_status ausage_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.del_flag adel_flag, a.create_time acreate_time, a.create_by acreate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.categories_supply_channels_code acategories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name acategories_supply_channels_name, a.auditor_status aauditor_status, a.selection_effective_start_time aselection_effective_start_time, a.selection_effective_time aselection_effective_time, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.form_no aform_no, a.be_effective abe_effective, c.procurement_section_name aprocurement_section_name, b.id bid, b.supply_unit_code bsupply_unit_code, b.supply_unit_name bsupply_unit_name, b.product_sku_code bproduct_sku_code, b.product_sku_name bproduct_sku_name, b.out_put bout_put, b.need_days bneed_days, b.apply_code bapply_code, b.del_flag bdel_flag, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by, a.origin_tax_included_price,a.rate_of_margin,a.origin_rate_of_margin from apply_product_sku_supply_unit a left join apply_product_sku_supply_unit_capacity b on a.product_sku_code = b.product_sku_code and a.supply_unit_code = b.supply_unit_code and a.apply_code = b.apply_code left join product_sku c on a.product_sku_code = c.sku_code where a.apply_code = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id aid, a.supply_unit_code asupply_unit_code, a.supply_unit_name asupply_unit_name, a.no_tax_purchase_price ano_tax_purchase_price, a.tax_included_price atax_included_price, a.joint_franchise_rate ajoint_franchise_rate, a.point apoint, a.tax_rate atax_rate, a.factory_sku_code afactory_sku_code, a.is_default ais_default, a.product_sku_code aproduct_sku_code, a.product_sku_name aproduct_sku_name, a.usage_status ausage_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.del_flag adel_flag, a.create_time acreate_time, a.create_by acreate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.categories_supply_channels_code acategories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name acategories_supply_channels_name, a.auditor_status aauditor_status, a.selection_effective_start_time aselection_effective_start_time, a.selection_effective_time aselection_effective_time, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.form_no aform_no, a.be_effective abe_effective from apply_product_sku_supply_unit a where a.product_sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.auditor_status = 1 and a.apply_show = 0

select a.sku_code, a.sku_name, a.product_code, a.product_name, a.procurement_section_code, a.procurement_section_name, a.product_sort_code, a.product_sort_name, a.product_category_code, CONCAT(lv1.category_name,'-',lv2.category_name,'-',lv3.category_name,'-',lv4.category_name) product_category_name, a.categories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name, a.product_brand_code, a.product_brand_name, a.product_property_code, a.product_property_name, b.Input_tax_rate, a.goods_gifts, a.create_time, a.create_by, a.update_by, a.update_time from product_sku a LEFT JOIN product_category lv4 on lv4.category_id = a.product_category_code LEFT JOIN product_category lv3 on lv3.category_id = lv4.parent_id LEFT JOIN product_category lv2 on lv2.category_id = lv3.parent_id LEFT JOIN product_category lv1 on lv1.category_id = lv2.parent_id left join product_sku_checkout b on a.sku_code = b.sku_code where a.sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from product_sku_supply_unit where product_sku_code=#{skuCode} order by is_default desc limit 1
